headline: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) Announces Share Buyback Plan Worth Up To US$10 Billion
summary: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) recently announced a substantial share buyback program worth up to $10 billion, enhancing investor confidence. Concurrently, the company is advancing its optical interconnect solutions to support AI infrastructure, potentially bolstering its market position. In the broader market context, tech stocks experienced volatility amid news of tariff exemptions, affecting companies differently within the sector. headline: 1 Genius Stock to Buy Down 30% From Its High During the Nasdaq Bear Market
summary: One of those is Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO), as the market hasn't priced in the future growth of an exciting product line.  At one point, Broadcom's stock was down around 40% from its all-time highs, but has since rebounded to be down around 30%.  Whether you're paying a discount of 25% or 40% from its all-time high, there isn't a lot that's going to derail Broadcom, and investors should use this opportunity to load up on shares.
